Ini Rekomendasi Ombudsman untuk Seleksi CPNS 2019
06 Nov 2019, 07:20 by Eko Wahyudi, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Ombudsman RI menyampaikan sejumlah rekomendasi kepada Kementerian Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi, Kementerian Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan serta Badan Kepegawaian Negara (BKN) terkait pelaksanaan seleksi penerimaan Calon Pegawai Negeri Sipil atau CPNS 2019.
Anggota Ombudsman, Laode Ida mengatakan, rekomendasi yang pertama adalah setiap instansi dan kementaerian yang ikut serta dalam CPNS 2029 harus mempunyai pusat layanan atau bantuan. Pusat layanan ini harus benar-benar dapat menampung dan menyelesaikan keluhan para peserta. "Setiap instansi yang melakukan pembukaan harus punya compliance handling yang bersifat ad hoc," kata dia di kantor Ombudsman, Jakarta, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Walaupun pada tahun sebelumnya sudah ada Pusat Layanan, tapi Laode mengatakan itu hanya formalitas dan tidak bersifat khusus sehingga peserta seleksi tidak terlayani dengan baik. "Optimalisasi help desk. Berdasarkan temuan kami, hanya normatif dibentuk, kami melihat bahwa perlu ada optimalisasi dari help desk," ucapnya.
Rekomendasi kedua, soal rumpun keilmuan yang disyaratkan pada tahun lalu. Menurut Laode hal ini harus dievaluasi karena membingungkan para peserta dan membatasi peluang mereka dalam mengikuti seleksi. "Hal ini menimbulkan interpretasi sendiri-sendiri," tambahnya.
Dirinya mengaku telah menyampaikan hal ini kepada Kemenpan RB selaku ketua Panitia Seleksi dan Kemendikbud sebagai lembaga yang bertanggung jawab atas nomenklatur pendidikan.
"Kemendikbud akan segera mengundang beberapa perguruan tinggi untuk menyepakati rumpun keilmuan supaya nanti membantu para panitia dan para verifikator kemnterian masing-masing," ungkap dia.
Rekomendasi ketiga, soal persyaratan seleksi yang membuat orang bingung dan multitafsir, Laode mengungkapkan, hal ini harus dimodifikasi tahun ini, agar para peserta dapat memahami dengan baik, dan tidak ada yang mengalami kegagalan dalam pemberkasan karena salah memahami kriteria yang dibebankan.
"Seperti tahun lalu, soal lowongan menjadi penghulu, di situ tidak dicantumkan soal gender khusus, yang seharusnya hanya boleh diikuti para pria, tetapi kemarin ada wanita yang ikut," ungkapnya.
Rekomendasi terakhir yang sudah dijalankan BKN adalah seleksi CPNS 2019 mengakomodir peserta CPNS 2018 yang telah lolos passing grade (Seleksi Kompetensi Dasar) SKD namun tidak tertampung pada seleksi tahun lalu. "Diberikan kesempatan ikut tahun ini bukan SKD lagi tapi langsung SKB. Tapi syaratnya harus dicermati betul agar tidak keliru," kata Laode.

This is the Ombudsman's Recommendation for the 2019 CPNS Selection
Nov 06 2019, 07:20 by Eko Wahyudi, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Indonesian Ombudsman submitted a number of recommendations to the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform, the Ministry of Education and Culture and the National Civil Service Agency (BKN) regarding the implementation of selection for the recruitment of prospective Civil Servants or CPNS 2019.
Ombudsman member Laode Ida said the first recommendation was that every agency and ministry involved in CPNS 2029 must have a service or assistance center. The service center must really be able to accommodate and resolve complaints from participants. "Every agency that conducts an opening must have ad hoc compliance handling," he said at the Ombudsman office, Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
Although in the previous year there was a Service Center, Laode said that it was only a formality and was not specific so that the selection participants were not well served. "Optimizing the help desk. Based on our findings, only normatives are formed, we see that there needs to be optimization of the help desk," he said.
The second recommendation is about the scientific family that was required in the past year. According to Laode this must be evaluated because it confuses the participants and limits their chances of participating in the selection. "This gives rise to individual interpretations," he added.
He claimed to have conveyed this to the Ministry of Education and Culture as the chairman of the Selection Committee and the Ministry of Education and Culture as the institution responsible for the nomenclature of education.
"The Ministry of Education and Culture will soon invite several universities to agree on scientific groups so that they will help the committee and the verifiers of their respective ministries," he said.
The third recommendation, about the selection requirements that make people confused and multiple interpretations, Laode revealed, this must be modified this year, so that participants can understand well, and no one has failed in filing because of misunderstanding the criteria imposed.
"Like last year, the matter of vacancies became stewards, there was no special gender issue, which should only be followed by men, but yesterday there were women who participated," he said.
The last recommendation that has been carried out by BKN is the selection of CPNS 2019 to accommodate participants of CPNS 2018 who have passed the SKD passing grade but were not accommodated in the selection last year. "Given the opportunity to participate this year is not SKD anymore but directly SKB. But the conditions must be carefully examined so as not to be mistaken," Laode said.
